column5: This is a terrific looking site fellas! Alot of good information and some great people!   Kudos to the OFC community!  Mike
ok me too  welcome aboard  and it is a great site
Definately a nice hello, happy to be a member post Terry...I removed my signature pic, sorry if it offended anyone. Glad to have found the site!  regards, Mike

welcome aboard,and its better than great,its the BEST SITE ON THE NET,WITH THE BEST PEOPLE ANYWHERE   ,and the admin & moderators work very hard and keep it a very freindly family oriented site,  take care and happy holidays
Mickey! welcome to OFC! remember you from the old FH days... I will be at the rumble this season!
It's a great board, I was impressed with how smoothly the switch went, considering how many members made the move and having to learn a new format.  Mike

Hey Crazyhook! Great to see ya again! Would be great to see you at the RUMBLE in 07! Had a great turnout this year with some great prizes! Yourself and all the rest of the OFC members are welcome to participate!  Mikey
Okay i gotta ask.  What the heck is a rumble?  & welcome to the forum mikey.

nautifish...the RUMBLE (RUMBLE in Rockland) was born a few years ago. It's a Pike/Bass tournament we hold every September out of Rockland Ontario on the Ottawa river. It's a one day / one fish per species tourney, biggest single fish weight,  with some great prizes. It's a fun tournament, that heas a field of everything from bass boats to 12 foot tinnies....We go to a guys house for burgers and dogs afterwards that's included in the entrance fee ($10.00 per species)...here's a link to read more about it...hope to see ya there! It's a great day with alot of laughs! RUMBLE in Rockland 06  regards, Mike  Thx for the welcome nautifish! much appreciated!
